data.title: Would You Choose the Same Nationality If You Were Born Again?
data.meta_description: Nationality is an important element in the formation of identity, but this brings up a question; that is whether people are proud of their nationality. Thus, we decided to investigate how many people would prefer to have the same nationality if they were born again. This survey is important because it could provide an opportunity to recognize people's interest in other countries and their patriotism
data.text: Nationality is an important element in the formation of identity, but this brings up a question; that is whether people are proud of their nationality.
